Author: pistachiocreams
Text: thank you for your advice ❤️ i’m not sure what i’ll do yet, i have several different (short) trips planned for december and calorie counting tends to stress me out if i try to log everything. i had a breakdown my second day in italy (lol) in front of my family so i would like for that to not happen again. i do think i should probably try and stick to a budget on one day trips though. i love gluwein and everything but maybe just one hot drink or snack would be enough to tide me over?  and thank you! i hope everything is going well for you as well.

Author: luxorange
Text: Could you try eating at maintenance until the holidays are over? Or eat maintenance on the days there are holidays and markets etc? It is too sad for me to go to the markets and fairs and stuff and not participate at all, on those days I try to be flexible for myself. This season is hard for balancing it all. And if you decide not to restrict at all, I think that is fine! I think a lot of us might be making similar decisions. Also -- you already reached a major goal (only halfway through the year!!) which is awesome, congrats!
